description: Order of simple Chevalley group A_3(q) (or D_3(q)), q = prime power.
references: J. H. Conway, R. T. Curtis, S. P. Norton, R. A. Parker and R. A. Wilson, ATLAS of Finite Groups. Oxford Univ. Press, 1985, p. xvi.
H. S. M. Coxeter and W. O. J. Moser, Generators and Relations for Discrete Groups, 4th ed., Springer-Verlag, NY, reprinted 1984, p. 131.
formula: a(n) = a(A000961(n+1),3) where a(q,n) is defined in A003793. - _Sean A. Irvine_, Sep 18 2015
mathematica: f[m_, n_] := Block[{g, x, y}, g[x_, y_] := x^(y (y + 1)/2) Product[x^k - 1, {k, 2, y + 1}]; g[m, n]/GCD[n + 1, m - 1]]; f[#, 3] & /@ Select[Range[2, 20], PrimePowerQ] (* _Michael De Vlieger_, Sep 18 2015 *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
